Ne odbija se Real lako
03 Nov 2019, 11:48 by Nemanja
Bivši potpredsednik Monaka Vadim Vasiljev oktrio je za francuske medije detalje razgovora sa Kilijanom Mbapeom, nakon što je fudbaler odbio prelazak u Real Madrid.
Velika bitka vodila se 2017. godine za usluge Kilijana Mbapea, a pobedu je na kraju odneo Pari Sen Žermen. On je prvo stigao na jednogodišnju pozajmicu usled poštovanja finansijskog fer-pleja, posle čega su Parižani za 180 miliona evra otkupili njegov ugovor sa Monakom. Real Madrid je iste godine pokušao da dovede Kilijana Mbapea u svoje redove, ali mladi Francuz je odbio tu mogućnost, bar za sada.
Prema rečima nekadašnjeg potpredsednika kluba iz Kneževine, gde se Mbape probio na svetsku fudbalsku scenu, napadač nije želeo tako rano da se otisne u madridski klub.
 – Rekao mi je: ,,Duboko u sebi, znam da je previše rano. Ja sam Parižanin, i ne želim da napustim svoju zemlju tek tako.“ – prepričao je Vasiljev.
Nije tajna da je Real Madrid ozbiljno zainteresovan za Kilijana Mbapea, tako je bilo tokom leta koje je iza nas, tako je bilo i prethodne godine.
Nedavno su iz Madrida, nakon het-trika Francuza protiv Klub Briža stizale nove naznake da će Mbape biti primarna meta i narednog leta, kojeg Španci nazivaju ,,opsesijom“ za ,,los blankose“.
Kilijan Mbape je ove sezone odigrao 10 utakmica u svim takmičenjima, postigao devet golova uz četiri asistencije.

It doesn't bounce off Real easily
03 Nov 2019, 11:48 by Nemanja
Former Monaco vice-president Vadim Vasilyev has revealed to French media details of talks with Kilian Mbape after the footballer refused to move to Real Madrid.
The big battle was fought in 2017 for the services of Kilian Mbape, and the victory was eventually won by Paris Saint-Germain. He first arrived on a one-year loan due to financial fair play, after which the Parisians bought his contract with Monaco for 180 million euros. Real Madrid tried to bring Kilian Mbape to their ranks the same year, but the young Frenchman rejected the option, at least for now.
According to the former Vice-President of the Principality Club, where Mbape broke into the world football scene, the striker did not want to go to the Madrid club so early.
- He said to me, "Deep down, I know it's too early. I am a Parisian, and I do not want to leave my country just like that, ”Vasilyev said.
It is no secret that Real Madrid is seriously interested in Kilian Mbape, so it was during the summer that is behind us, so it was the previous year.
Recently, after the Frenchman's hat trick against Club Bruges, new indications have emerged that Mbape will be the primary target next summer, which the Spaniards call an "obsession" for "los blankose."
Kilian Mbape has played 10 games in all competitions this season, scoring nine goals with four assists.
